error_details.explanation: Incorrect final answer. An intermediate value 'cost_additional_classes' (value: 30.0) was reported instead of 'total_cost' (value: 105.0).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 30
The classes in the pack cost $7.5 each because 75 / 10 = <<75/10=7.5>>7.5
An additional class costs $10 because 7.5 x (1 +(1/3)) = <<7.5*(1+(1/3))=10>>10
She buys 3 extra classes because 13 - 10 = <<13-10=3>>3
Her three additional classes cost $30 because 3 x 10 = <<3*10=30>>30
